entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Dunchurch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:14 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny then a mix of sun and cloud with flurries beginning this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
